short-title.#text:
Sequester for Congressional Pay and
			 Accountability Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Sequestering the pay of members of
			 congress

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by adding at
			 the end the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 251 of the Balanced Budget and
			 Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985/s:251

text.#text:
beginning on the
				effective date of the first furlough of any individual employed by the Federal
				Government relating to a sequestration order issued under this Act; and

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985/s:251/ss:d/p:1/sp:A

text.#text:
ending on the
				last day of the fiscal year to which the sequestration order described in

During a furlough period, the pay of each
				Member of Congress shall be reduced by the greatest percentage by which the pay
				of an individual employed by the Federal Government is reduced as a result of a
				furlough relating to the sequestration order for that furlough
				period.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Sequester for Congressional Pay and Accountability Act/s:2/ss:b/p:2

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall take effect on the date of enactment of
			 this section.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Sequester for Congressional Pay and Accountability Act/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
to the pay of Members of Congress
			 pursuant to
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Sequester for Congressional Pay and Accountability Act/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is held to be unconstitutional under the XXVII
			 Amendment to the Constitution of the United States, the amendment made by
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Sequester for Congressional Pay and Accountability Act/s:2/ss:b/p:1

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall take effect upon the convening of the 114th
			 Congress.

			 of the amendment made by
